word:
MR No. 1050 - Trust in God; Seek to Forget Marital Problems

           (Written August 29, 1888, from Healdsburg, California.) 

     I received your two letters, but I have labored so hard here in Healdsburg that I was not in a condition to write to you. I have not slept since 1:00 a.m. and I am now writing to you while others are asleep.
